actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that time spent by a federal employee in a travel status shall be considered as hours of employment.

summary.text: Provides that time spent by a Federal employee in a travel status shall be considered as hours of employment. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5542(b)(2), 5544(a))

titles.title: A bill to provide that time spent by a federal employee in a travel status shall be considered as hours of employment.
